revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR340G |revision=v3 |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR340GV3 |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2317 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L64164A-7T |ram1_num= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8236 |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?model=TL-WR340G TL-WR340G product page]
Same as the TL-WR340GD aside from the antenna configuration. The TL-WR340G has an integral antenna. The TL-WR340GD has a RP-SMA connector.
Flash on the v3 is assumed to remain 2 MB.
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=200635 On the DD-WRT forums] (part details, links to high-res images of v3 via Dropbox)
